item.description: 2022-07-25 flw for example is only supported by 32-bits. Therefore, there is a fail march test which uses rv32i. rv64 doesn’t support zcf, so should I still do the same thing?
2022-07-26 c.flwsp -> zero-extended 6-bit immediate, scaled by 4 (4^6=4096) and the boundary is half of that minus 1, thus 2047.

item.title: 2022-08-02-cobra-report
item.description: Assembler Support for the CORE-V Zc* Extension - Report 2nd of August 2022 The Zc* extensions are being carefully tested and the testsuite for Zc* has been expanded.

item.description: Assembler Support for the CORE-V Zc* Extension - Report Completed Last Week Verified Zc* with the GNU assembler (gas).
2022-08-17 Cobra Tasks Fix Issues: Jump table located incorrectly Relaxation (Charlie has submitted a PR) (GCC) Incorrect version Then we can test the linker.

item.title: Building Cobra
item.description: How to build I have a cobra folder which contains: 1 2 ❯ ls binutils build install logs toolchain Here binutils is my corev-binutils-gdb fork, I just renamed it so the build script can find it.

item.description: How to Manually Check a Test Instruction listing: So we have: 1 011u uurr ruud dd00 For example, if we want to test:
